channel.title: Search on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Search on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Google’s experimental Windows app is better than Microsoft’s built-in search
item.description: Google’s experimental app is an upgrade over Microsoft’s Windows search.

item.title: USA Today Enters Its Gen AI Era With a Chatbot
item.description: DeeperDive, a new tool that converses with readers, is an effort to beat the AI industry at its own game.

item.title: USA Today Enters Its Gen AI Era With a Chatbot
item.description: DeeperDive, a new tool that converses with readers, is an effort to beat the AI industry at its own game.

item.title: In court filing, Google concedes the open web is in “rapid decline”
item.description: Google’s position on the state of the Internet is murky to say the least.

item.title: How to Add WIRED as a Preferred Source on Google (2025)
item.description: The new Google Preferred Sources tool helps you see more of what you want in your search results.

item.title: How to Add WIRED as a Preferred Source on Google (2025)
item.description: The new Google Preferred Sources tool helps you see more of what you want in your search results.

item.title: Judge: Google can keep Chrome, must share search data with “qualified competitors”
item.description: Google’s penalty for being a search monopoly does not include selling Chrome.

item.title: Google won’t have to sell Chrome, judge rules
item.description: Google’s penalty for being a search monopoly does not include selling Chrome.

item.title: Enough is enough—I dumped Google’s worsening search for Kagi
item.description: I like how the search engine is the product instead of me.

item.title: Google tool misused to scrub tech CEO’s shady past from search
item.description: Google has fixed the bug, which it says affected only “a tiny fraction of websites.”

item.title: Google’s new “Web Guide” will use AI to organize your search results
item.description: The Web Guide experiment is available as an opt-in feature today.
